11.1.hd_quote: The serendipity of being in the right place at the right time.
11.1.behavioral_axis: Seeks others who will value and share ideas, recognizing that ideas only have value when resonating with those in the right place at the right time.
11.1.shadow_axis: Doubts whether anyone will value ideas, searching constantly for validation rather than allowing natural recognition and shared resonance.
11.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

11.2.hd_quote: The recognition that without vigilance and risk, peace can lead to stagnation and collapse.
11.2.behavioral_axis: Naturally gifted with creative imagination, called out when others recognize the imaginative potential held within, working ideas internally as art.
11.2.shadow_axis: Provokes others with ideas to escape boredom, projecting ideas outward that bore others instead of developing creative potential internally.
11.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

11.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments with ideas that come and go through trial-and-error, discovering the beauty that ideas need not be taken seriously or applied.
11.3.shadow_axis: Becomes irresponsible with ideas, appreciating harmony to the point of delusion, believing beauty is eternal while fiddling as Rome burns.
11.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

11.4.hd_quote: Believe in me and you shall be redeemed.
11.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes fixed ideas to stimulate belief in others, teaching concepts that attract the uneducated to believe first before understanding through experience.
11.4.shadow_axis: Attracts only a fringe who can grasp narrow-minded concepts, becomes dangerously dogmatic, intentionally limiting wisdom to a few believers.
11.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

11.5.hd_quote: The philanthropist is about giving away your ideas.
11.5.behavioral_axis: Holds steady under projection field, giving away humanitarian ideas that guide others through shared human experience, recognizing ideas emerge through others.
11.5.shadow_axis: Withdraws from direct contact where giving becomes a form of defense, sending people away with ideas instead of truly sharing experience.
11.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

11.6.hd_quote: The innate awareness that all forms are transitory.
11.6.behavioral_axis: Develops objectivity about which ideas have value in any situation, seeing how the whole collective process operates and timing transitions wisely.
11.6.shadow_axis: Speculates with ideas for personal profit at expense of others, taking advantage of transitions in peace or war without concern for consequences.
11.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
